    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">From static charge to electric current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von der statischen Ladung zum elektrischen Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De la charge statique au courant électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da carga de estática à corrente elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalla carica statica alla corrente elettrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη στατική δαπάνη στο ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De carga estática a la corriente eléctrica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how static charges are produced and converted to electric current by means of a Van de Graaff machine, a fluorescent lamp, and a ground wire</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earthed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fluorescent lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ground</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Van de Graaff apparatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie statische Ladungen in 
elektrischen Strom mittels einer Packwagende Graaff Maschine, einer 
Leuchtstofflampe und eines Erdungsdrahts produziert und umgewandelt 
werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment des frais statiques 
sont produits et convertis en courant électrique au moyen d'une 
machine de de Graaff de fourgon, d'une lampe fluorescente, et d'un fil
de masse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como as cargas de estática 
são produzidas e convertidas à corrente elétrica por meio de uma 
máquina de de Graaff da camionete, de uma lâmpada fluorescente, e de
um fio à terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come le spese statiche sono 
prodotte e convertite in corrente elettrica per mezzo di una macchina 
del de Graaff del furgone, di una lampada fluorescente e di un filo di
messa a terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς οι στατικές 
δαπάνες παράγονται και μετατρέπονται στο ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα με τη 
βοήθεια μιας μηχανής de Graaff φορτηγών, ενός φθορισμού 
λαμπτήρα, και ενός επίγειου καλωδίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo las cargas estáticas
se producen y se convierten a la corriente eléctrica por medio de una
máquina de de Graaff de la furgoneta, de una lámpara fluorescente, y
de un alambre de tierra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mit Erde bedeckt worden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leuchtstofflampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Van de Graaff Apparat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mis à la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant électrique</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">lampe fluorescente</string>
          </keyword>
